title: KNWA & Fox24 News
summary: KNWA Northwest Arkansas News, Weather, and Pig Trail Nation
description: The KNWA Northwest Arkansas News app offers superior local News, Weather and Sports at home or on-the-go. You can count on KNWA to provide the latest news, weather, sports and more in Northwest ArkansasFeatures:- News, Weather, Sports, Photos, Videos and More- View Community/Neighborhood News- Geo-located Weather and Advertising- Weather Central Interactive Radar- Live Streaming Audio and Video- Submit Photos and Videos- Receive Alerts for Breaking News, Severe Weather, School Closings and More- Share Content via E-mail, Text Message, and on Facebook and Twitter- And More
descriptionHTML:
The KNWA Northwest Arkansas News app offers superior local News, Weather and Sports at home or on-the-go. You can count on KNWA to provide the latest news, weather, sports and more in Northwest Arkansas
Features:
- News, Weather, Sports, Photos, Videos and More
- View Community/Neighborhood News
- Geo-located Weather and Advertising
- Weather Central Interactive Radar
- Live Streaming Audio and Video
- Submit Photos and Videos
- Receive Alerts for Breaking News, Severe Weather, School Closings and More
- Share Content via E-mail, Text Message, and on Facebook and Twitter
- And More
comments: Unfortunately I don't have anything positive to say about the new KNWA app released on 6/22/2017. I've given it about 10 days just to make sure I just didn't like "change". However, it's just not very user friendly. Navigation is not easy, and you have to click numerous times to reach sports or weather. I won't quit using the app but hope it's updated again soon. Thanks
It is very unstable also it has ads and when you want to look at weather one comes up and blows you out of radar screen
